tr_quotes.quote: Hepimiz söylediğimiz, düşündüğümüz veya yaptığımız her şeyin doğrudan sonucu olan kendi düşüncemizin atmosferine daldık.
tr_quotes.author: Ernest S. Holmes

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini yalnız hisseden kimse için her yer çöldür.
tr_quotes.author: Anton Pavlovic Cehov

tr_quotes.quote: Ne zaman mutlu olmaya kalksam otur diyor yalnızlığım, otur.
tr_quotes.author: Küçük İskender

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnız insanların, kendi içinde başlayıp biten eğlenceleri vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Oğuz Atay

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlığı soruyorlar; yalnızlık bir ovanın düz oluşu gibi bir şey.
tr_quotes.author: Cemal Süreya

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık insana çok şey öğretirmiş. Ama sen gitme, ben cahil kalayım.
tr_quotes.author: Nazım Hikmet

tr_quotes.quote: Tek başına mutsuz olmak, birisiyle beraberken mutsuz olmaktan iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık kadar arkadaş canlısı bir başka arkadaş daha bulamadım.
tr_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

tr_quotes.quote: Değeri bilmeden yalnızlığından kurtulmak istiyorsan; kurtulsan da yalnızsın.
tr_quotes.author: Aziz Nesin

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık tek kelime, söylenişi ne kadar kolay. Halbuki yaşanması o kadar zordur ki.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Sakin bir hayatın tekdüzeliği ve yalnızlığı, yaratıcı aklı harekete geçirir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Bir akıl ne kadar güçlü ve orijinalse, o ölçüde yalnızlığın mezhebine doğru kayar.
tr_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlarla uzun süre yaşayamıyorum. Sonsuzluğun payından bana biraz yalnızlık gerek.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık, alınyazısının insanı kendi kendisine ulaştırmak için başvurduğu bir yoldur.
tr_quotes.author: Herman Hesse

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer bir kişi yalnız olmayı beceremiyorsa, başkalarıyla bir arada olmayı da beceremez.
tr_quotes.author: Michel Foucault

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnız bir hayat sürenlerin akıllarında, mutlaka konuşmaya can attıkları bir konu vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anton Çehov

tr_quotes.quote: Zeki bir insan yalnızlıkta, düşünceleri ve hayal gücüyle mükemmel bir eğlenceye sahiptir.
tr_quotes.author: Schopenhauer

tr_quotes.quote: Bazen kalabalıkların ortasında, tek başımıza kaldığımız vakitlerinkinden fazla yalnız değil miyiz?
tr_quotes.author: Peyami Safa

tr_quotes.quote: Bir derin kuyuya benzer yalnız. Taş atmak kolaydır içine: ama bu taş dibe inecek olursa, kim çıkarabilir?
tr_quotes.author: Nietzsche

tr_quotes.quote: Yanımda kimse olmadığından değil yalnızlığım, yalnız olduğumu söyleyebileceğim kimse olmadığı için yalnızım ben.
tr_quotes.author: Ahmet Altan

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir insan asla yalnız değildir. Çünkü arkasında fark etmeden bıraktığı izleri muhakkak biri fark etmiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık en içimizdedir.
tr_quotes.author: Oruç Aruoba

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnız olmak yanlış bir kalpte olmaktan iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Bukowski

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık sizin size yokuşunuzdur.
tr_quotes.author: Hasan Ali Toptaş

tr_quotes.quote: Kibrin en kesin tedavisi yalnızlıktır.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Wolfe

tr_quotes.quote: Dilin söylediği kötü söz aklın yalnızlığı mıdır? Gözlerin akmadığı bir hüzün, yanakların yalnızlığı mıdır?
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşlandıkça yalnızlıkla daha iyi anlaşıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Sienna Miller

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini yalnız hisseden kimse için her yer çöldür.
tr_quotes.author: Anton Pavlovic Cehov

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlarla uzun süre yaşayamıyorum. Sonsuzluğun payından bana biraz yalnızlık gerek.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyanın en kuvvetli insanı, en fazla yalnız kalabilendir.
tr_quotes.author: Henrich Ibsen

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnız insanların, kendi içinde başlayıp biten eğlenceleri vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Oğuz Atay

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık insana çok şey öğretirmiş. Ama sen gitme, ben cahil kalayım.
tr_quotes.author: Nazım Hikmet

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık, hayata güzellik katar. Gün batımına ayrı bir kızıllık, geceye farklı bir koku verir.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

tr_quotes.quote: Kendini yalnız hisseden kimse için her yer çöldür.
tr_quotes.author: Anton Pavlovic Cehov

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük bir yalnızlık olmadan ciddi bir eser verilemez.
tr_quotes.author: Picasso

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnız insanların kendi içinde başlayıp biten eğlenceleri vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Oğuz Atay

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlıktan hoşlanan ya vahşi hayvandır ya da Tanrı.
tr_quotes.author: Aristotales

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın insana verdiği en değerli şeydir yalnızlık.
tr_quotes.author: Edip Cansever

tr_quotes.quote: Tek başına mutsuz olmak birisiyle beraberken mutsuz olmaktan iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık insana çok şey öğretirmiş. Ama sen gitme ben cahil kalayım.
tr_quotes.author: Nazım Hikmet

tr_quotes.quote: Değeri bilmeden yalnızlığından kurtulmak istiyorsan kurtulsan da yalnızsın.
tr_quotes.author: Aziz Nesin

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer bir kişi yalnız olmayı beceremiyorsa başkalarıyla bir arada olmayı da becermez.
tr_quotes.author: Michel Foucault

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık hayata güzellik katar. Gün batımına ayrı bir kızıllık geceye farklı bir koku verir.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

tr_quotes.quote: O kadar yalnızım ki sıradaki şarkı bir sonraki şarkıya gelsin.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçek dostu olmamak, yalnızlığın en kötüsüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık, adam olmayanların vereceği saygıdan, sevgiden iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Mevlana

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük bir yalnızlık olmadan, ciddi bir eser verilemez.
tr_quotes.author: Picasso

tr_quotes.quote: Fena kimselerle görüşüp buluşmaktansa, yalnız kalmayı tercih ediniz.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Collingwood

tr_quotes.quote: Çok vagonlu bir trende her istasyonda yeniden başlayan çok seferli bir yolculuktur yalnızlık!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnız olmak zayıf olmak demek değildir, hak ettiğiniz kişiyi bekleyecek kadar güçlüsünüz demektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlığı sevmeyen özgürlüğü de sevmez. Kişi ancak yalnız olduğunda özgürdür çünkü.
tr_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

tr_quotes.quote: Yalnızlık meşakkatli iş… Kendi kendine konuşmak neyse de cevap vermek bir hayli zor oluyor.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hep korkarız yalnızlıktan ama bil ki yalnızsan; yalancı arkadaşların, ikiyüzlü dostların ve çekip gidecek bir sevgilin olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much
en_quotes.author: Helen Keller

en_quotes.quote: You cannot go far alone. You enjoy your journey better if you have people by your side
en_quotes.author: Karan Patel

en_quotes.quote: The best part about being alone is that you really don't have to answer to anybody. You do what you want
en_quotes.author: Justin Timberlake

en_quotes.quote: I'm open, and I'm out there, but I also enjoy being alone, relaxing
en_quotes.author: Jazz Jennings

en_quotes.quote: Your grief path is yours alone, and no one else can walk it, and no one else can understand it
en_quotes.author: Terri Irwin

en_quotes.quote: I found that with depression, one of the most important things you could realise is that you're not alone
en_quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Loneliness expresses the pain of being alone and solitude expresses the glory of being alone
en_quotes.author: Paul Tillich

en_quotes.quote: Freedom of being alone is intoxicating
en_quotes.author: Kangana Ranaut

en_quotes.quote: It is true that integrity alone won't make you a leader, but without integrity you will never be one
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: The soul that sees beauty may sometimes walk alone
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: I'm calculating, self-sufficient, reserved, and I enjoy being alone
en_quotes.author: Melissa Sue Anderson

en_quotes.quote: The light of lights looks always on the motive, not the deed, the shadow of shadows on the deed alone
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: It is far better to be alone, than to be in bad company
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: All men's miseries derive from not being able to sit in a quiet room alone
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: You can get help from teachers, but you are going to have to learn a lot by yourself, sitting alone in a room
en_quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

en_quotes.quote: Loneliness is the poverty of self; solitude is the richness of self
en_quotes.author: May Sarton

en_quotes.quote: I have always worked better alone and from my own impressions
en_quotes.author: Claude Monet

en_quotes.quote: One man alone can be pretty dumb sometimes, but for real bona fide stupidity, there ain't nothin' can beat teamwork
en_quotes.author: Edward Abbey

en_quotes.quote: No memory is ever alone; it's at the end of a trail of memories, a dozen trails that each have their own associations
en_quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

en_quotes.quote: Then stirs the feeling infinite, so felt In solitude, where we are least alone
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: It was by one Union that we achieved our independence and liberties, and by it alone can they be maintained
en_quotes.author: James Monroe

en_quotes.quote: I'm learning a lot about myself being alone, and doing what I'm doing
en_quotes.author: Chantal Kreviazuk

en_quotes.quote: Like they say, you can learn more from a guide in one day than you can in three months fishing alone
en_quotes.author: Mario Lopez

en_quotes.quote: Life could be wonderful if people would leave you alone
en_quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

en_quotes.quote: The people, and the people alone, are the motive force in the making of world history
en_quotes.author: Mao Zedong

en_quotes.quote: Plant and your spouse plants with you; weed and you weed alone
en_quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

en_quotes.quote: The doer alone learneth
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: It's better to be unhappy alone than unhappy with someone - so far
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: I rise to taste the dawn, and find that love alone will shine today
en_quotes.author: Ken Wilber

en_quotes.quote: A leader does not deserve the name unless he is willing occasionally to stand alone
en_quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

en_quotes.quote: Associate yourself with people of good quality, for it is better to be alone than in bad company
en_quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

en_quotes.quote: I am not afraid of being alone and single
en_quotes.author: LeToya Luckett

en_quotes.quote: You can't please everybody. I give up. I'm not trying to. I don't care. Leave me alone with that
en_quotes.author: Estelle

en_quotes.quote: I finally faced the fact that it isn't a crime not having friends. Being alone means you have fewer problems
en_quotes.author: Whitney Houston

en_quotes.quote: It took living alone for me to really get to know myself
en_quotes.author: Camila Mendes

en_quotes.quote: Man alone is born crying, lives complaining, and dies disappointed
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Man cannot live by bread alone; he must have peanut butter
en_quotes.author: James A. Garfield

en_quotes.quote: What a child can do in cooperation today, he can do alone tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Lev Vygotsky

en_quotes.quote: Remember that the revolution is what is important, and each one of us, alone, is worth nothing
en_quotes.author: Che Guevara

en_quotes.quote: Perhaps I know best why it is man alone who laughs; he alone suffers so deeply that he had to invent laughter
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: I never have tantrums. If anything makes me mad, I'm silent. If I'm not talking, leave me alone
en_quotes.author: Pat Nixon

en_quotes.quote: There is no end of craving. Hence contentment alone is the best way to happiness. Therefore, acquire contentment
en_quotes.author: Swami Sivananda

en_quotes.quote: Our Lord has written the promise of resurrection, not in books alone, but in every leaf in springtime
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: The eternal quest of the individual human being is to shatter his loneliness
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: Grant that I may not pray alone with the mouth; help me that I may pray from the depths of my heart
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: To go out with the setting sun on an empty beach is to truly embrace your solitude
en_quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

en_quotes.quote: You alone are enough
en_quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

en_quotes.quote: Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for
en_quotes.author: Dag Hammarskjold

en_quotes.quote: And if you don't believe the sun will rise, stand alone and greet the coming night in the last remaining light
en_quotes.author: Chris Cornell

en_quotes.quote: If you are lonely when you're alone, you are in bad company
en_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

en_quotes.quote: Moon! Moon! I am prone before you. Pity me, and drench me in loneliness
en_quotes.author: Amy Lowell

en_quotes.quote: In the absence of any other proof, the thumb alone would convince me of God's existence
en_quotes.author: Isaac Newton

en_quotes.quote: Justice cannot be for one side alone, but must be for both
en_quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: The picture alone, without the written word, leaves half the story untold
en_quotes.author: James Lafferty

en_quotes.quote: We can all understand that feeling of being alone in the world trying to find ways to not be alone
en_quotes.author: Andrew Haigh

en_quotes.quote: Change alone is eternal, perpetual, immortal
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: Living alone makes it harder to find someone to blame
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: I'm so accustomed to being alone
en_quotes.author: Leighton Meester

en_quotes.quote: I only go out to get me a fresh appetite for being alone
en_quotes.author: Lord Byron

en_quotes.quote: I need some isolation, it's necessary to me, that's just who I am. I need to be left alone
en_quotes.author: Laura Marling

en_quotes.quote: The best of artists has no conception that the marble alone does not contain within itself
en_quotes.author: Michelangelo

en_quotes.quote: People used what they called a telephone because they hated being close together and they were scared of being alone
en_quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

en_quotes.quote: What is uttered from the heart alone, Will win the hearts of others to your own
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: I'm very shy really. I spend a lot of time in my room alone reading or writing or watching television
en_quotes.author: Johnny Cash

en_quotes.quote: I'm fiercely independent, but I'm also terrified of being alone
en_quotes.author: Adam Levine

en_quotes.quote: I don't know. I think it's funny! I think it's funny! I go, what? It's so absurd. I'm alone
en_quotes.author: Danny DeVito

en_quotes.quote: I'm a loner. I like to be alone. I'm socially awkward
en_quotes.author: Guillermo Diaz

en_quotes.quote: Time alone reveals the just man; but you might discern a bad man in a single day
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: It's amazing living alone. I'm very lucky. It's like a refuge
en_quotes.author: Paloma Faith

en_quotes.quote: I've lived on my own since I was 18, and I really love living alone. That, to me, is just great
en_quotes.author: Danielle Fishel

en_quotes.quote: An artist is always alone - if he is an artist. No, what the artist needs is loneliness
en_quotes.author: Henry Miller

en_quotes.quote: Inside myself is a place where I live all alone and that is where I renew my springs that never dry up
en_quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

en_quotes.quote: I love photo sessions. I'm alone, I'm the queen, everyone's taking care of me
en_quotes.author: Eva Herzigova

en_quotes.quote: When the people you love are gone, you're alone
en_quotes.author: Keanu Reeves

en_quotes.quote: Associate with men of good quality if you esteem your own reputation; for it is better to be alone than in bad company
en_quotes.author: George Washington

en_quotes.quote: Virtue is not left to stand alone. He who practices it will have neighbors
en_quotes.author: Confucius

en_quotes.quote: Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from the mouth of God
en_quotes.author: Jesus Christ

en_quotes.quote: If I am a legend, then why am I so lonely?
en_quotes.author: Judy Garland

en_quotes.quote: As I get older I'm more and more comfortable being alone
en_quotes.author: Sienna Miller

en_quotes.quote: It's really hard to do this life - to be a human being alone
en_quotes.author: Benji Madden

en_quotes.quote: A hospital alone shows what war is
en_quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

en_quotes.quote: I like to read books and be alone; I'm not social butterfly person. I'm sorry
en_quotes.author: Hope Solo

en_quotes.quote: Remember, man does not live on bread alone: sometimes he needs a little buttering up
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: I would say, 'I'm alone, but I'm not lonely.' But I was just kidding myself
en_quotes.author: Bruce Willis

en_quotes.quote: Life is tough in Mumbai when you are alone
en_quotes.author: Kartik Aaryan

en_quotes.quote: These roads do not serve transportation alone, they also bind our Fatherland
en_quotes.author: Fritz Todt

en_quotes.quote: Reason is not automatic. Those who deny it cannot be conquered by it. Do not count on them. Leave them alone
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: Travelling alone was like laundry for my thoughts
en_quotes.author: Mark Foster

en_quotes.quote: To have striven, to have made the effort, to have been true to certain ideals - this alone is worth the struggle
en_quotes.author: William Osler

en_quotes.quote: If you can eat five fruits and vegetables a day, that alone can totally change your diet
en_quotes.author: Maye Musk

en_quotes.quote: The thought of being alone when time goes on is a little bit scary sometimes, but not really
en_quotes.author: Celia Hammond

en_quotes.quote: The struggle alone pleases us, not the victory
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: I actually like being alone. I spend most evenings reading and taking long baths
en_quotes.author: Shonda Rhimes

en_quotes.quote: A lot of people prefer to be alone. They would rather be a palm tree on an island. I don't get it
en_quotes.author: Jose Andres

en_quotes.quote: On stage I make love to twenty five thousand people; and then I go home alone
en_quotes.author: Janis Joplin

en_quotes.quote: A well-instructed people alone can be permanently a free people
en_quotes.author: James Madison

en_quotes.quote: I think a lot of kids feel alone and slightly isolated and in their own world
en_quotes.author: Tim Burton

en_quotes.quote: Schizophrenia beats dining alone
en_quotes.author: Oscar Levant

en_quotes.quote: Costumes and scenery alone will not attract audiences
en_quotes.author: Anna Held

en_quotes.quote: Let me alone, and go in search of someone else
en_quotes.author: Ali ibn Abi Talib

en_quotes.quote: Jealousy is no more than feeling alone against smiling enemies
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

en_quotes.quote: With the brush we merely tint, while the imagination alone produces colour
en_quotes.author: Theodore Gericault

en_quotes.quote: Besides individual things like thunder and gunshots, what dogs fear most is not belonging, being alone
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Marshall Thomas

en_quotes.quote: If I was writing songs just for me I'd only play them in my living room, alone
en_quotes.author: Tori Amos

en_quotes.quote: She can't even chew gum and walk in a straight line, let alone write a book
en_quotes.author: Liam Gallagher

en_quotes.quote: I never did anything alone. Whatever was accomplished in this country was accomplished collectively
en_quotes.author: Golda Meir

en_quotes.quote: I like to read books and be alone; I'm not social butterfly person
en_quotes.author: Hope Solo

en_quotes.quote: Talent alone gets you nowhere. You really have to have the grit, and you gotta have a love for people
en_quotes.author: Zac Brown

en_quotes.quote: He alone loves the Creator perfectly who manifests a pure love for his neighbor
en_quotes.author: Venerable Bede

en_quotes.quote: I feel so good after a workout. Any time you can be alone with yourself is really important
en_quotes.author: Shay Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: You aren't going to leave me alone are you?
en_quotes.author: Edie Adams

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes I sneak out into the streets alone, like Princess Jasmine in 'Aladdin.'
en_quotes.author: Jacob Zachar

en_quotes.quote: I'm an introvert. I get my energy by spending time alone. I need that hour or two to myself every day
en_quotes.author: Amit Bhatia

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes I think we're alone. Sometimes I think we're not. In either case, the thought is staggering
en_quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Everything great in the world comes from neurotics. They alone have founded our religions and composed our masterpieces
en_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

en_quotes.quote: No one is alone, and each change here brings about another change there
en_quotes.author: Octavio Paz

en_quotes.quote: Words and pictures can work together to communicate more powerfully than either alone
en_quotes.author: William Albert Allard

en_quotes.quote: When thinking about companions gone, we feel ourselves doubly alone
en_quotes.author: Walter Scott

en_quotes.quote: Whatever my individual desires were to be free, I was not alone. There were many others who felt the same way
en_quotes.author: Rosa Parks

en_quotes.quote: The strong man is strongest when alone
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: I am not the most courageous guy in the world outside of the court. Being alone in the dark is something I don't like
en_quotes.author: Rafael Nadal

en_quotes.quote: I think it's very healthy to spend time alone. You need to know how to be alone and not be defined by another person
en_quotes.author: Olivia Wilde

en_quotes.quote: I'm an only child, and I don't mind being alone
en_quotes.author: Bianca Andreescu

en_quotes.quote: We are all sentenced to solitary confinement inside our own skins, for life
en_quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

en_quotes.quote: I have the handicap of being born with a special language to which I alone have the key
en_quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

en_quotes.quote: Testing oneself is best when done alone
en_quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

en_quotes.quote: No one is good but God alone. What is good is therefore divine, what is divine is therefore good
en_quotes.author: Saint Ambrose

en_quotes.quote: We are never the same with others as when we are alone. We are different, even when we are in the dark with them
en_quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

en_quotes.quote: I got married for the wrong reasons. I was tired of being alone. I have to own that. It was me, not her
en_quotes.author: Steve Harvey

en_quotes.quote: I want to be alone
en_quotes.author: Greta Garbo

en_quotes.quote: He never is alone that is accompanied with noble thoughts
en_quotes.author: John Fletcher

en_quotes.quote: Your actions, and your action alone, determines your worth
en_quotes.author: Evelyn Waugh

en_quotes.quote: Time alone is irreplaceable. Waste it not
en_quotes.author: Douglas Southall Freeman

en_quotes.quote: It is very easy to love alone
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: It is strange to be known so universally and yet to be so lonely
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: You're only lonely if you're not there for you
en_quotes.author: Phil McGraw

en_quotes.quote: Being alone is very difficult
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: The man who goes alone can start today; but he who travels with another must wait till that other is ready
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: I like dancing but not in crowded clubs. I would rather dance alone than go to a club
en_quotes.author: Disha Patani

en_quotes.quote: I actually like spending time alone - it doesn't bother me at all
en_quotes.author: Jacob Whitesides

en_quotes.quote: A man is rich in proportion to the number of things he can afford to let alone
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Having your father to help you to get back up is good, but you need to get up by yourself and walk alone. Life goes on
en_quotes.author: Lyoto Machida

en_quotes.quote: I know to win a championship, you're not going to do it alone. You're going to have to have a great supporting cast
en_quotes.author: Klay Thompson

en_quotes.quote: It's time to end the cruel slaughter of whales and leave these magnificent creatures alone
en_quotes.author: Paul McCartney

en_quotes.quote: Down to Gehenna, or up to the Throne, He travels the fastest who travels alone
en_quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

en_quotes.quote: There is danger that we lose sight of what our friend is absolutely, while considering what she is to us alone
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: I am alone; I am always alone no matter what
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to be alone, I want to be left alone
en_quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

en_quotes.quote: Blood alone moves the wheels of history
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: You need to learn a practical lesson. Grit alone is not going to save you from sinking
en_quotes.author: David Robinson

en_quotes.quote: The only real progress lies in learning to be wrong all alone
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: To Follow by faith alone is to follow blindly
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: I grew up in a very large family in a very small house. I never slept alone until after I was married
en_quotes.author: Lewis Grizzard

en_quotes.quote: I'm never less at leisure than when at leisure, or less alone than when alone
en_quotes.author: Scipio Africanus

en_quotes.quote: We are rarely proud when we are alone
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: We are nothing if we walk alone; we are everything when we walk together in step with other dignified feet
en_quotes.author: Subcomandante Marcos

en_quotes.quote: I knew I was alone in a way that no earthling has ever been before
en_quotes.author: Michael Collins

en_quotes.quote: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be
en_quotes.author: Ellen Burstyn

en_quotes.quote: Education alone can conduct us to that enjoyment which is, at once, best in quality and infinite in quantity
en_quotes.author: Horace Mann

en_quotes.quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend
en_quotes.author: Conor Oberst

en_quotes.quote: I alone of English writers have consciously set myself to make music out of what I may call the sound of sense
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: If you go long enough without a bath, even the fleas will leave you alone
en_quotes.author: Ernie Pyle

en_quotes.quote: I'm very social, and in a place like New York, even if you're alone on the subway, you never feel lonely
en_quotes.author: Ana Gasteyer

en_quotes.quote: If there's anything worse than a woman living alone, it's a woman saying she likes it
en_quotes.author: Thelma Ritter

en_quotes.quote: Time, which alone makes the reputation of men, ends by making their defects respectable
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: You cannot be lonely if you like the person you're alone with
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer
